description: Application to vary condition 12 (energy and sustainability statement) and delete condition 13 (air source heat pump) and 22 (boiler details) of planning permission Ref: DM2022/00615 for the 'Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a part two, part three and part five storey building containing 17 flats along with parking, cycle/refuse stores and hard and soft landscaping' to allow for amendment to the approved Energy Strategy report.

PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: DM2023/01718--- Address: Development Site On Land At 102 To 104Rose HillSutton--- Proposal: Application Reference Number: DM2022/00615	Date of Decision: 09/02/2023Condition Number(s): 13 and 22Conditions(s) Removal:We are seeking variation of conditon 12 and removal of conditions 13 and 22. Please see cover letter for details.The development hereby approved shall be constructed in accordance with the approved Energy and Sustainability Statement issue 3 (Ref: 4599) prepared by SRE Ltd (Rev B) and dated 23 March 2022 and the Rose Hill Proposed Material Amendment to Approved Energy Strategy prepared by Synergy dated 16 October 2023.  The Proposed Material Amendment to Approved Energy Strategy replaces the energy sections of the Energy and Sustainability Statement issue 3 (Ref: 4599). Prior to first occupation, as-built' Standard Assessment Procedure (SAP) outputs based on SAP 10.2 carbon factors must be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing to demonstrate that the development has achieved the targeted reduction in CO2 emissions. All of the approved measures must thereafter be retained for as long as the development is in existence.--- Status: REC--- Decision: --- Date Decision Issued: ---
